Workflow for GTN Pangeo 101 for everyone - Introduction to Xarray

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Pangeo ecosystem 101 for everyone - Introduction to Xarray Galaxy Tools](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/climate/tutorials/pangeo/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
